welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Highland Park, where charm and beauty meet. Get ready to explore our vibrant city, known for its scenic parks, diverse culture, and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful time discovering all that East Highland Park has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richmond International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Richmond International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Richmond International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Richmond International Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'RIC Free Wi-Fi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.
